item.title: Oxygen
item.description: A woman wakes up in a medical cryogenic unit. She does not remember who she is or how she ended up locked in a box no bigger than a coffin. While running out of oxygen, he must rebuild his memories to escape that nightmare. Year: 2021 Running time: 101 min. Country: France Director: Alexandre Aja Screenwriter: Christie LeBlanc Music: Robin Coudert Cinematography: Maxime Alexandre Producer: Co-production France-United States; Echo Lake Productions, Wild Bunch, Getaway Films Distributor: Netflix Cast: MÃ©lanie Laurent, Malik Zidi, Marc Saez, Eric Herson-Macarel, Cathy Cerda Trailer Oxygen Official Trailer
